import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../assets/profile.png' import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css' import { validateUsername } from '../helper/Validate' import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast' import { useFormik } from 'formik' const Username = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { Username: '' }, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, // onSubmit onSubmit: async values => { console.log(values) } }) return ( <>

) } export default Username
